On the day before his Hero Exam, the Demon King was defeated, so now that Raul can't become a Hero, he settles down to work at Magic Shop Leon, a small consumer electronics store in the Royal Capital. After leaving his heroics behind and becoming a store clerk, Raul has been busy every day. However, his average life takes a great turn when he meets a young girl seeking a part time job. Her name is Fino. She's the daughter of the defeated Demon King.

(Source: ANN)
